reviews.review: Full of cheaters and full of fun.
Пришел никем и уйдешь таким же. И все только запомнят красную надпись у тебя в профиле,которую никто не станет оспаривать. Ведь ты думаешь кто-то тебе верил?

CS:GO is a good game in general but some things changes it. First of all the Anti Cheat (VAC) is worse than trash. Literally in every 5 games you are guaranteed to see 2 to 3 cheaters. And Valve doesn't do anything about it. This Anti Cheat problem exists since 2011 but still VAC is trash as hell. 

Secondly there is a system called "Trust Factor". Trust Factor checks your behaviour in game and gives you a kind of like a point. The more positive you are the more points you get. For example a guy is so toxic and rages all the time and this guy's Trust Factor point is low. This guy won't be matched against high pointed players. The problem is since there are a lot of cheaters in game you can report them. But the more you report, the more your Trust Factor points get lower. Since I play tryhard in every competitive game I try to report every cheater I see. And because of these reports my Trust Factor is so low and I am matching against 100 hour - 5 level profile gamers. And these guys cheat a lot in high elo games. I am trying to be positive and calm but since my Trust Factor point is low, I am always matching against cheaters and that annoys me so much. 

At last but not least, there are some other matchmaking servers too. Like FACEIT or ESEA. These servers have their own Anti Cheat so you can play on these servers with no cheater whatsoever. But these servers doesn't give you a CS:GO MM rank. Instead they have their own ranks and give you these.

If you want to play this game competitive. Don't even try to cue in MM (MatchMaking). You will be matched against  cheaters all the time. Try these servers that I mentioned before. ESEA is not free but you can play free on FACEIT. 

Good Luck Have Fun to you all!

This game is not worth the time investment, it's outdated and new games coming out seem to be better.
